mapper.delete: delete from Favorite where MNO=#{mno} and BNO=#{bno}
mapper.select: select MNO, BNO, ADD_DT from Favorite where MNO=#{mno} and BNO=#{bno}
select count(*) from Favorite where BNO=#{bno}
select count(*) from Favorite where BNO=#{bno} and Mno=#{mno}

select favorite.mno, recipe.bno, recipe.title, recipe.m_photo, recipe.w_dt, r_photo.cont from favorite inner join recipe on favorite.mno=#{mno} and favorite.bno=recipe.bno left join r_photo on recipe.bno=r_photo.bno group by r_photo.bno order by recipe.bno desc limit 0, 4
